scripts.git:submodules:update: git submodule update ; git submodule foreach --recursive "git submodule update"
scripts.postinstall: npm run git:submodules:update ; npm run hardhat:compile
scripts.hardhat:clean: rm -rf src/plugins/hardhat/typechain && hardhat clean --config src/plugins/hardhat/hardhat.config.ts --tsconfig src/plugins/hardhat/tsconfig.json
scripts.hardhat:compile: npm run hardhat:clean && hardhat compile --config src/plugins/hardhat/hardhat.config.ts --tsconfig src/plugins/hardhat/tsconfig.json
scripts.hardhat:deploy:dev: npm run hardhat:compile && hardhat run src/plugins/hardhat/scripts/deploy.ts --network hardhat --config src/plugins/hardhat/hardhat.config.ts --tsconfig src/plugins/hardhat/tsconfig.json
scripts.hardhat:deploy:local: npm run hardhat:compile && hardhat run src/plugins/hardhat/scripts/deploy.ts --network localhost --config src/plugins/hardhat/hardhat.config.ts --tsconfig src/plugins/hardhat/tsconfig.json
scripts.hardhat:deploy:rinkeby: npm run hardhat:compile && hardhat run src/plugins/hardhat/scripts/deploy.ts --network rinkeby --config src/plugins/hardhat/hardhat.config.ts --tsconfig src/plugins/hardhat/tsconfig.json
